data.title: Ezel & Rona Ray
data.meta_description:
Take Me Home by Ezel & Rona Ray, released 01 December 2023

1. Take Me Home (Original Mix)
2. Take Me Home (Radio Version)

We're thrilled to present you the Ezel & Rona Ray lead single of their forthcoming homonymous album 'Take Me Home' set to drop at the beginning of 2024

For the past 3 years this powerful creative duo has been cultivating straight up bangers on the underground house scene to critical acclaim. After a string of highly successful releases such as 'Don't Know Yet' & 'History Repeating' and 'Hard To Stay Away' they are now ready to unveil the full picture of their blissful musical alignment and elevate their game once again with this soulful house master piece in the style of what you would expect from this 2 highly gifted individuals.

There is something about the communion of things that come to be when they work in song together and this one is no different. Rona Ray masterful songwriting and vocal delivery matches and follow to perfection Ezel killer production and what we get is yet another timeless song of anthem proportions that is set to rock dance floors worldwide for years to come.

Ezel & Rona Ray - Take Me Home
taken from their forthcoming homonymous album release 'Take me Home'
